rows.name: color: string | string[]
rows.description: (or colors) used to generate sparkles (use 'rainbow' for an assortment of colors)

rows.name: count: number
rows.description: number of sparkle particles to create

rows.name: overlap: number
rows.description: number of pixles out of the sparkling component to allow sparkles to be created

rows.name: sparkling: boolean
rows.description: whether the component should be sparkling

rows.name: speed: number
rows.description: how fast to fade sparkles in and out
